Il presidente John Elkann : nessuna vendita a pezzi, ci teniamo tutto. Dal salone dell' auto di Detroit l' amministratore delegato Sergio Marchionne ha annunciato che Fiat? salita al 25% di Chrysler. Sergio Marchionne ha aggiunto che ci sono le condizioni per salire al 51%. Fiat ha le risorse finanziarie per farlo anche adesso se necessario . Sergio Marchionne ha precisato che Fiat ha potuto salire al 25% di Chrysler`` perch e stata adempiuta la prima condizione con la tecnologia Fiat certificata negli Usa. Bieb's popularity is more than just a passing pop music fad- he's got the goods to have real staying power.`` I do think that he has amazing talent,'' he says. You don't get a billion hits on title="YouTube LLC" href="http://www.nbcnewyork.com/topics?topic=YouTube+LLC"> YouTube for just sliding by and being a product. When he started before any record label was there he was making YouTube.com videos and getting millions of hits. When you watch them you can see an amazing talent and you can not deny that. No lights. No crazy crowd. Nothing. Just him with a web-cam in his room, and it's compelling. Saying his`` heart was in Indiana,'' Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.
